episodes.synopsis: Renovation work begins at Brian's century-old family home with the destruction of some interior walls and the construction of a brand-new kitchen.
episodes.title: The Brian Boitano Project

episodes.synopsis: Brian scours local flea markets in search of unique pieces for the dining room and adds a cozy living room crowned by a showstopping fireplace.
episodes.title: The Dining Room and Living Room

episodes.synopsis: The future site of Brian's bright and airy bathroom was once a dark and dirty space used for roasting chestnuts. Can Brian work his magic yet again?
episodes.title: The Bathroom

episodes.synopsis: Construction on the house is nearly complete, but with a visit from Brian's Italian relatives looming, there's still a lot of work to be done.
episodes.title: The Bedrooms and Piazza

video.title: The Brian Boitano Project
video.synopsis: Olympic figure skating champ Brian Boitano inherits a century-old villa in northern Italy and renovates it while learning about his Italian ancestry.
